title: Life Of Bill Cooper - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/4/20
itunes:title: Life Of Bill Cooper - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/4/20
description:
George Noory and Mark Jacobson discuss the life and times of Beyond the Pale Horse author Bill Cooper. His radio career and controversial military record are discussed. His influence ranges from various Hip Hop artists and Oklahoma City bomber Timothy McVeigh.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
